df <- read.csv('mlbootcamp5_train.csv')
head(df)
mean(df$height[df$gender == 1])
mean(df$height[df$gender == 2])
count(df$height[df$gender == 1])
count(df$height[df$gender == 2])
count(df$alco[df$gender == 1] & [df$alco == 1])
count(df$alco[df$gender == 2] & [df$alco == 1])
s_w <- (count(df$gender[df$gender == 1] & [df$smoke == 1])/ count(df$gender[df$gender == 1])) * 100
s_m <- (count(df$gender[df$gender == 2] & [df$smoke == 1])/ count(df$gender[df$gender == 2])) * 100
print(round(s_m/s_w))
df$age_years <- df$age /365
mean(df$age_years[df$smoke == 1])
mean(df$age_years[df$smoke == 0])
print(mean(df$age_years[df$smoke == 0])*12 - mean(df$age_years[df$smoke == 1])*12)
v1 <- df$cardio((df$gender == 2) & (df$age_years >=60) & (df$age_years <=64) & (df$smoke == 1) & (df$ap_hi < 120) & (df$cholesterol ==1))
v2 <- df$cardio((df$gender == 2) & (df$age_years >=60) & (df$age_years <=64) & (df$smoke == 1) & (df$ap_hi >= 160) &(df$ap_hi < 180) & (df$cholesterol ==1))
print(mean(v1*100)/mean(v2*100))
